title: Intro to HTML
summary: Learn the basics of HTML structure.
content: HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It's the foundation of web pages. You'll learn about tags, attributes, and document structure.

title: CSS Selectors
summary: Understand how to target HTML elements with CSS.
content: Selectors let you apply styles to specific elements. You'll explore class selectors, ID selectors, pseudo-classes, and specificity.

title: JavaScript Variables
summary: Use let, const, and var to store and update data.
content: Variables hold values you can access and change. You'll learn about declaration, scope, and modern usage with let/const.

title: What is an API?
summary: Explore how apps communicate using APIs.
content: APIs let software systems talk to each other. You'll see how REST APIs work using HTTP methods and JSON data.

title: Intro to Git & GitHub
summary: Learn the basics of version control and collaboration.
content: Git tracks file changes and lets you collaborate. GitHub hosts repositories online, where you can push, pull, and open issues.
